대사: @Hmm... the door is locked.@☆①
@The door is closed because time is late.@
@Let's see.... Ah^ it's open.@
@Oh... This is out of my league.@
(It looks like there are people inside.)☆①
(It's impossible to break in because there are people inside.)
(This is a dusty window.)☆①
(It looks like it can be broken.)
'It's not the time to argue about this and that...'
(I wrapped a piece of clothing around my fist and smashed the glass around the lock as quietly as I could.)
Phew... I can get in now.'
'It's not the time to argue about this and that...'
column4: 힘 판정으로 창문 부수기 성공 실패

대사: @Ugh...@※⑧
(A shard of glass is lodged in my fist^ drawing a little blood.)
'I must have put in a lot of strength than I thought…'
(The locker contains dirty worker outfit.)☆①
(At a quick glance^ nothing looks particularly special.)
(The locker contains dirty worker outfit.)☆①
'This looks like... a workman's outfit for a sewer worker.'
'If I take it with me^ I might be able to disguise myself as one of them.'
(I grabbed a pair of outfit.)⊙①
(Upon closer inspection^ I found a key in the inside pocket of the worker's outfit.)
'Is this... a key to the sewer?'⊙②
(I couldn't find anything special.)
(It appears to be an internal map of the (sewers).)☆①
(A map of the inside of a sewer that looks pretty old.)
(It appears to be an internal map of the (sewers).)☆①
(A map of the inside of a sewer that looks pretty old.)
'Hmm... I guess it wouldn't hurt to take it.'
(I carefully folded the map and put it in my pocket.)⊙③
@Hello^ I'm here to ask you a question.@
@Ugh. Mmm. What brings you here? I'm busy^ so make it quick.@
@It's just that I have a question about what's going on inside the (sewer).@
@I... I can't tell you anything!@
'I wonder if he knows it looks even more suspicious.'
@I can't tell you anything about (sewers)!@
@You're not a cop and you don't have a warrant. Get out of here!@
(He is sweating coldly^ afraid of offend some.)☆①
@Unless you have something to do^ get out of here!@☆①
(He averts his eyes as if he's uneasy about something.)
'Is he being blackmailed by something?'
@I'm pretty sure there's pressure by something^ but don't worry^ Warden.@
@As the you said^ I'm just a detective.@
@It won't even go down on record that I'm here.@
@And if I do something in the (sewers)^ it's not going to be easy to associate it with being here.@
@Hmmm...@
@You should be really secretive instead.@
@Even if you get caught^ you can't tell them about me^ Otherwise^ my family...@
'I think his family is caught by hostage.'
@Sure.@
@So... at least there's something going on inside the (sewer)^ right?@
@Oh^ yeah! A couple of months ago^ some strange people started coming to my house and threatening to take my family hostage.@
@They started by firing all the other workers and hiring their own.@
@And then they said^ Stay away from me the (sewer)^ and if I talk about it^ They'll kill ^my wife and child...@
@I see... that's unfortunate. But it'll be fixed soon.@
@Whether it's me or the police^ this will be resolved in the near future.@
(Based on his description^ it's clear that a group of people have taken over the (sewers).)
(But I don't think he knows exactly what's going on under the hood either.)
@If so^ can you give me a key to get inside the (sewers)?@
@A key..? Are you trying to get inside?@
@In some cases^ I think that might be the case.@
@I don't recommend it at all because they already have a presence there... but@
@No matter what I say^ you won't listen... Here it is.@⊙②
@Throw it in the river after you use it^ in case they find out I gave it to you.@
@Thank you.@
@And this is... this is a map of the priests.@
@It's probably not as good as a full map^ but it's better than nothing.@
@If you have a real map when you're caught^ wouldn't it be revealed that I gave it to you.@
@Sure. I'm grateful for that kindness. Thank you^ Warden.@⊙③
'It must be pretty serious... I didn't even say anything to him^ but he handed me a map.'
'Maybe he's been building a map of priests^ waiting for someone like me to show up.'
@Well^ no matter what you say^ you can't!@
(If anything^ it made him even more stubborn.)
(I got his attention and stole the keys from his outer pocket.)
'A small key... probably a (sewer) key^ right?'⊙②
(I couldn't find any loopholes.)
@(Aiden)... is he a journalist?@
column4: 키워드>>>하수도 - 에이든의 경고 or 하수도 - 문제의 근원

대사: @Yes^ he's a newspaper reporter working for the (Daily News).@
@If so^ he must be a recent visitor here.@
@A reporter came by with a question about (sewer ghost story).@
@Like you^ I sent him back saying I didn't know...@
@He must have gone to the (sewer).@
@Maybe the reporter saw something of the truth there.@
@It's a worker's outfit for the (sewer).@
@I'm sure they did this….!@
@A murder was committed and the getaway was a nearby (manhole)...?@
@I'm sure they did this….!@
@Then they're probably the same people who threatened me.@

@Thank you. I'll be sure to get it back to you later.@
@Well^ I'm not sure.@
